articles.title: Amazon, Apple and Google cut off Parler
articles.description: Over the past several months, Parler has become one of the fastest-growing apps in the United States. Millions of President Trump's supporters have flocked to it as Facebook and Twitter increasingly cracked down on posts that spread misinformation and incited violence.
articles.content:
Amazon's move meant that Parler's entire platform would soon go offline unless it was able to find a new hosting service on Sunday (Monday AEDT).
"Big tech really wants to kill competition," John Matze, Parler's chief executive, said in a text messag... [5266 chars]

articles.title: Some lending apps thrive on India's Google Play despite policy violations
articles.description: At least 10 Indian lending apps on Google's Play Store, which have been downloaded millions of times, breached Google rules on loan repayment lengths aimed at protecting vulnerable borrowers, according to a Reuters review of such services and more than a dozen users.
articles.content: MUMBAI (Reuters) - At least 10 Indian lending apps on Google’s Play Store, which have been downloaded millions of times, breached Google rules on loan repayment lengths aimed at protecting vulnerable borrowers, according to a Reuters review of such s... [6410 chars]

articles.description: La herramienta de videollamadas de Google permite que cualquier persona haga reuniones en línea con hasta 100 personas simultáneamente.
articles.content: En medio de la pandemia, Google amplió el acceso a Google Meet, la solución de videoconferencias premium de Google, de forma gratuita para todos con el objetivo de ayudar a que la comunicación y colaboración segura sea más fácil y accesible para empr... [724 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp a envoyé un Signal en tête des téléchargements d'apps
articles.description: L'évolution des conditions d'utilisation de WhatsApp a fait les bonnes affaires de ses concurrents, au premier rang desquels Signal et ensuite Telegram. Depuis la fin de la semaine dernière, Signal s'est hissé à la première place des téléchargements d'apps gratuites, dans plusieurs pays et aussi bien sur l'App Store que sur Google Play.
